src.Utility

Class GameLogger

  • java.lang.Object
    • src.Utility.GameLogger

  • public class GameLogger
extends java.lang.Object
    The class that logs all activities and writes it to a file. This is mainly for debugging during development. It can also provide the user details of what went wrong if they experience problems.
